Title: Allows a judicial district convention to be conducted in whole or in part via video conference
Summary: Allows a judicial district convention to be conducted in whole or in part via video conference upon a minimum of seventy-two hours notice to the members of the respective committee by mail, an appropriately titled email, text or telephone call at an address or number expressly provided in writing for the purpose of receiving such notices.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to allowing a judicial district convention to be conducted in whole or in part via video conference
